item.title: The Cryptography Lab
item.description: The Science of Secret Writing ðŸ”—https://cryptographylab.streamlit.app ðŸ”—I started this project to help me understand the encryption techniques Simon Singh explains in his fantastic book The Code Book - The Science of Secrecy From Ancient Egypt to Quantum Cryptography (Anchor Books, 2000). I plan to work with the concepts of cryptography and cryptanalysis history, laid out by Singh in his book, implementing the algorithms â€”to the best of my abilitiesâ€” with Python snippets and libraries.
